name: Puppies & Zombies
description:
You must rescue the puppies from the zombies using only your mouse!
Avoid the Zombies by hiding inside the trash, luring them with rocks, or killing them with guns. When you find a dog, bring it back to the heliport to rescue it.
You can buy stuff at the heliport, and even increase your movement speed and life!

LMB to move, RMB to hold items, while holding an item, press LMB to use it.

This game was done by me way back in 2013, in a single week, when I was just starting with game dev, and a company lured me to do spec work for them. In the end I ended up refusing their offer and got away. It was not a good experience for me personally, but I ended up with this cute game/prototype that never got released.
So, here it is!
